GenAiFunction.description: - Use this action to convert PlantUML diagram text into an image URL - This action does not invent the diagram text but only encoded it into an URL - Render as an HTML A link with target="_blank" to the image. - The URL encoding this action uses only works with smaller diagrams. If you get passed a large diagram feel free to reduce its size by removing irrelevant detail like redundant or overly detailed field lists. - Maximum URL length: 2048 characters - Syntax must start with @startuml and end with @enduml - Use UTF-8 encoding for special characters
